content.raw:
note that I didn't compile all of boost for windows with VS 2017; I just cherry-picked the header-only files needed by sdformat (any.hpp, variant.hpp, version.hpp, and upstream includes) with the [bcp](https://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_67_0/tools/bcp/doc/html/index.html) utility and uploaded those:

* https://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/win32/deps/boost_1.67.0_any_variant_version.zip

It's still over 1 MB of header files when compressed! But it's a bit smaller than the 500 MB we use for gazebo:

* http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/boost_1_56_0.zip
content.html:
note that I didn't compile all of boost for windows with VS 2017; I just cherry-picked the header-only files needed by sdformat (any.hpp, variant.hpp, version.hpp, and upstream includes) with the bcp utility and uploaded those:

  • https://osrf-distributions.s3.amazonaws.com/win32/deps/boost_1.67.0_any_variant_version.zip

It's still over 1 MB of header files when compressed! But it's a bit smaller than the 500 MB we use for gazebo:

  • http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/boost_1_56_0.zip
